name: Jean-Simon Bonin
body:
# Summary
Bachelor in IT Engineering specialized in conception and development of mobile solutions, especially on the Android platform.

# Experience
###Consultant
CGI

**Mobile solutions developement**
* Android applications developement.
* RESTful Web Services developement.
* User interface conception.
* Quality assurance testing.


###Android developer
Summit Tech Multimedia

**Android applications developement**
* Real-time voice and video communications.
* Instant messaging and file transfer.
* User interface.
* Quality assurance testing.


# Contact
js.bonin@gmail.com
